Title: Burning Love
Plot: Michael reunites with his long, lost love Sally Sitwell, but faces interference from parents. Meanwhile, the two Lucilles need someone to bid on them at the bachelorette auction with Buster already in a relationship.
GuestStars: Christine Taylor, Ed Begley Jr., Rob Corddry, Justin Grant Wade, Spencer Redford, Kevin Kirkpatrick, Jack McBrayer
